Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Misinterpret \Mis`in*ter"pret\, v. t. To interpret erroneously; to understand or to explain in a wrong sense. [1913 Webster]

misinterpret v 1: interpret falsely 2: interpret wrongly; "I misread Hamlet all my life!" [syn: {misread}] 3: interpret in the wrong way; "Don't misinterpret my comments as criticism"; "She misconstrued my remarks" [syn: {misconstrue}, {misconceive}, {misunderstand}, {misapprehend}, {be amiss}]
